last_episode_to_air.name: Family Reunion - and Farewell (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ezra and the Ghost crew look to complete their ultimate mission: to liberate Lothal from the clutches of the Empire.

name: Star Wars Rebels
overview: Set between the events of Star Wars: Episodes III and IV, the story unfolds during a dark time when the evil Galactic Empire is tightening its grip of power on the galaxy. Imperial forces have occupied a remote planet and are ruining the lives of its people. The motley but clever crew of the starship Ghost — cowboy Jedi Kanan, ace pilot Hera, street-smart teenager Ezra, the “muscle” Zeb, warrior firebrand Sabine, and cantankerous old astromech droid Chopper — is among a select few who are brave enough to stand against the Empire. Together, they will face threatening new villains, encounter colorful adversaries, embark on thrilling adventures, and become heroes with the power to ignite a rebellion.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A brave and clever ragtag starship crew stands up against the evil Empire as it tightens its grip on the galaxy and hunts down the last of the Jedi Knights.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The Ghost crew leave Lothal and become a part of a galaxy-wide rebellion.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Sometime after the events on Malachor, Ezra must struggle with his temptation towards the dark side. The Ghost crew helps build up the rebellioin on Atollon.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: After a devastating battle on Atollon, the Ghost crew and the rebellion continue the fight against the Imperial Forces.

episodes.name: Droids in Distress
episodes.overview: The rebel group intercepts an Imperial weapon shipment and unintentionally take on an android duo.

episodes.name: Fighter Flight
episodes.overview: Ezra and Zeb go to Lothal's market for provisions and to work on their relationship.

episodes.name: Rise of the Old Masters
episodes.overview: The rebel crew undergoes a rescue mission only to face a powerful foe.

episodes.name: Breaking Ranks
episodes.overview: The Rebels send Ezra on an undercover mission into the Imperial Academy to steal a decoder.

episodes.name: Out of Darkness
episodes.overview: While on a supply run, Hera and Sabine find themselves stranded but not alone in a seemingly abandoned locale.

episodes.name: Empire Day
episodes.overview: While disrupting Empire Day festivities in order to destroy a prototype TIE fighter, the crew learns a refugee has important information and must get him off-planet before the Imperials find him.

episodes.name: Gathering Forces
episodes.overview: Kanan and Ezra try to protect an Imperial deserter by distracting the Imperial forces.

episodes.name: Path of the Jedi
episodes.overview: Ezra must face a great challenge as part of his growth as a member of the team.

episodes.name: Idiot's Array
episodes.overview: The crew are forced into transporting some unusual cargo after an issue with a new acquaintance.

guest_stars.character: Admiral Kassius Konstantine / Old Jho / TIE Pilot #2 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dee Bradley Baker

episodes.name: Vision of Hope
episodes.overview: While attending a gathering for those who would oppose the Empire, the crew finds out something unexpected.

episodes.name: Call to Action
episodes.overview: As public awareness increases around Rebel activity, they target an important Imperial network.

episodes.name: Rebel Resolve
episodes.overview: The team tries to get Kanan's location to free him.

episodes.name: Fire Across the Galaxy
episodes.overview: The crew has to go through many obstacles to save Kanan.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A brave and clever ragtag starship crew stands up against the evil Empire as it tightens its grip on the galaxy and hunts down the last of the Jedi Knights.

episodes.name: The Lost Commanders
episodes.overview: Ahsoka sends the Rebel crew to find and recruit a war hero to their cause, but when they discover it is Captain Rex, trust issues put the mission at risk.

episodes.name: Relics of the Old Republic
episodes.overview: Ezra and the others are starting to form friendships with the old Clone Troopers, but Kanan can't seem to bring himself to trust them. Will he feel differently when pressure from the Empire forces them to work together?

episodes.name: Always Two There Are
episodes.overview: Ezra, Zeb, Sabine, and Chopper are on a mission to an abandoned medistation in search of supplies when an attack by two of Darth Vader's Inquisitors divides the team.

episodes.name: Brothers of the Broken Horn
episodes.overview: In order to flee the pressure of the responsibility of being a rebel and a Jedi, Ezra goes on a rescue mission together with Chopper after they received a distress call. They are surprised to find out the ship in need belongs to Hondo Ohnaka. Hondo offers Ezra to join him.

episodes.name: Wings of the Master
episodes.overview: Since the rebels are in need of a new ship in order to overcome an Imperial blockade, Hera embarks on a dangerous mission to meet an eccentric starship engineer and manages to gain his trust. But will that be enough to get a ship from him?

episodes.name: Blood Sisters
episodes.overview: On a mission to escort a courier with secret information vital to the rebel cause to a rendezvous point, Sabine must face off against her old friend and partner.

episodes.name: Stealth Strike
episodes.overview: A new Imperial ship captures Ezra, Commander Sato, and his crew, forcing Kanan and the clone to go undercover as stormtroopers to free the rebels.

guest_stars.character: Rex / Rebel Pilot / Imperial Weapons Technician #1 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dee Bradley Baker

episodes.name: The Future of the Force
episodes.overview: The rebels learn that the Inquisitors are seeking out Force-sensitive children, and they work together to protect the young ones from the Inquisitors' pursuit.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: As the Empire attacks the rebel fleet on Garel, Kanan, and Ezra return to Lothal and find a former prisoner with knowledge about Ezra's parents.

guest_stars.character: Fifth Brother / Rebel Trooper / Phoenix Squadron Pilot (voice)
guest_stars.name: Philip Anthony-Rodriguez

episodes.name: A Princess on Lothal
episodes.overview: During the early rebellion against the rule of the Galactic Empire, Princess Leia Organa of Alderaan is sent to the planet Lothal on a mission to provide ships for the rebel fleet. When the Empire initiates a lockdown, her plan is thrown into jeopardy

episodes.name: The Protector of Concord Dawn
episodes.overview: In need of new hyperspace routes due to Imperial pressure, the rebels find a shortcut but must first gain permission to use it.

episodes.name: Legends of the Lasat
episodes.overview: When the crew of the Ghost agrees to help two refugees who are revealed to be surviving Lasat, Zeb must come to terms with his past to help his people reach their new home.

episodes.name: The Call
episodes.overview: While on a mission to obtain fuel for the rebel fleet, the crew works to protect space creatures from the Mining Guild asteroid mining operation that threatens the creatures' lives.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: The rebels contact freedom fighter Cham Syndulla, who needs help to fight off the Imperial bombing attack on his planet. While coordinating a plan to overtake and steal the carrier that houses these Imperial bombers, the rebels discover that Cham may have a plan of his own.

guest_stars.character: Cham Syndulla / Rebel Captain / Imperial Officer #2 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Robin Atkin Downes

episodes.name: The Honorable Ones
episodes.overview: Zeb and Agent Kallus find themselves stranded on an ice planet after a failed Imperial ambush of the rebels. With Kallus injured from the escape pod crash, he and Zeb must work together to survive the harsh conditions.

episodes.name: Shroud of Darkness
episodes.overview: Kanan, Ezra, and Ahsoka return to the Jedi Temple on Lothal, seeking answers from Yoda about the Inquisitors’ ability to continually track the rebels.

episodes.name: The Forgotten Droid
episodes.overview: When Chopper gets left behind at an Imperial outpost, he forms an unlikely friendship with an Imperial droid, and discovers a base location for the rebels.

episodes.name: The Mystery of Chopper Base
episodes.overview: Kanan, Ezra, and Ahsoka prepare to depart to unravel Vader’s secret, while the rebels find a way to fend off the predatory creatures that occupy the planet.

episodes.name: Twilight of the Apprentice
episodes.overview: After gaining information about the Sith, Kanan, Ezra, and Ahsoka battle the Inquisitors with the help of a new ally, but are overmatched when Vader arrives.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The Ghost crew leave Lothal and become a part of a galaxy-wide rebellion.

episodes.name: Steps Into Shadow
episodes.overview: Ezra, Sabine, Zeb, Chopper and Hera sets out to rescue Hondo Ohnaka, while Kanan finds an ancient force creature know as The Bendu.

episodes.name: The Holocrons of Fate
episodes.overview: When Maul takes the crew of the Ghost hostage, Ezra and Kanan must pass a trial in order to recover an ancient Sith artifact to save them.

episodes.name: The Antilles Extraction
episodes.overview: With the rebellion in desperate need of pilots, Sabine goes undercover as an Imperial cadet to recruit defectors -- including the confident and gifted Wedge Antilles.

guest_stars.character: Female Civilian / Governor Pryce / TIE Cadet #2 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Mary Elizabeth McGlynn

episodes.name: Hera's Heroes
episodes.overview: Hera's rebel supply mission to Ryloth becomes personal when she and the Ghost crew brave overwhelming Imperial forces to recover a memento from her ancestral home.

episodes.name: The Last Battle
episodes.overview: On a salvage mission led by Captain Rex, the Ghost crew is captured by a unit of old battle droids determined to fight one last battle to end the Clone Wars.

guest_stars.character: Admiral Konstantine / Red Pauldron Trooper / Rex (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dee Bradley Baker

episodes.name: Imperial Supercommandos
episodes.overview: Having lost contact with the Protectors of Concord Dawn, Sabine, Ezra, and Fenn Rau investigate and find the base occupied by Imperial Mandalorians.

episodes.name: Iron Squadron
episodes.overview: Ezra and Sabine team up to tame a rogue, young hotshot pilot and his crew who recklessly risk their lives in a fight to defend their home world from Imperial occupation.

episodes.name: The Wynkahthu Job
episodes.overview: The rebels team with a pair of unscrupulous pirates to salvage a freighter full of weapons for the rebellion, but the mission ends up being far more dangerous than anticipated.

episodes.name: An Inside Man
episodes.overview: Seeking information on a new Imperial weapon, Ezra and Kanan infiltrate the Imperial factory on Lothal, but must trust an unlikely ally to escape a lockdown.

guest_stars.character: Factory Worker / Ryder Azadi / Stormtrooper Commander (voice)
guest_stars.name: Clancy Brown

episodes.name: Visions and Voices
episodes.overview: Maul returns, looking to finally unlock the secrets that he and Ezra desire.

episodes.name: Ghosts of Geonosis (1)
episodes.overview: The crew returns to Geonosis in search of a missing rebel team sent to investigate suspicious activity there, and are surprised by what they find.

episodes.name: Ghosts of Geonosis (2)
episodes.overview: After finding a missing rebel team member, the Ghost crew discovers another surprise on Geonosis, and work to conceal it from Imperial Forces.

episodes.name: Warhead
episodes.overview: Zeb and Chopper bring a damaged droid found in the Atollon wilderness back to base, only to discover that the droid is a new Imperial probe programmed to spy on and destroy rebels.

episodes.name: Trials of the Darksaber
episodes.overview: To help recruit her people to join the rebels, Sabine reluctantly agrees to learn to wield an ancient Mandalorian weapon but finds the challenge more difficult than expected.

episodes.name: Legacy of Mandalore
episodes.overview: Hoping to get her family to help the rebels, Sabine returns home with Kanan and Ezra, and finds herself embroiled in her family's power struggle for Mandalore.

episodes.name: Through Imperial Eyes
episodes.overview: Fearing that the identity of a rebel spy will soon be discovered by the Empire, the Rebels launch a plan to rescue him before he is caught.

guest_stars.character: Deck Officer / Imperial Tech / Lieutenant Lyste (voice)
guest_stars.name: Liam O'Brien

episodes.name: Secret Cargo
episodes.overview: The Ghost crew must escort Senator Mon Mothma, now wanted by the Empire, to a meeting that can change the galaxy.

episodes.name: Double Agent Droid
episodes.overview: Chopper and AP-5 team up to infiltrate an Imperial station to steal needed codes, but an Imperial specialist turns the droids against the crew to cause chaos.

episodes.name: Twin Suns
episodes.overview: Reacting to a vision of Maul, Ezra defies Hera and Kanan to travel to a remote planet in hopes of stopping the former Sith lord from carrying out his plans.

episodes.name: Zero Hour (1)
episodes.overview: In final preparations for their attack on Lothal, Phoenix Squadron's plans are disrupted when Grand Admiral Thrawn discovers their location.

episodes.name: Zero Hour (2)
episodes.overview: Trapped on Atollon with the rebel base under siege, Hera and Kanan fight to keep the squadron alive, as Ezra attempts to rally help from an unexpected source.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Sometime after the events on Malachor, Ezra must struggle with his temptation towards the dark side. The Ghost crew helps build up the rebellioin on Atollon.

episodes.name: Heroes of Mandalore (1)
episodes.overview: Sabine leads Ezra, Kanan and an army of her fellow Mandalorians back to her home world to rescue her father from the clutches of the Empire.

episodes.name: Heroes of Mandalore (2)
episodes.overview: When Sabine discovers the Empire has resurrected a devastating weapon she created and plans to use it against her people, she must decide whether to destroy it or use it herself.

guest_stars.character: Kryze Pilot / Lead Eldar Warrior / Stormtrooper (voice)
guest_stars.name: Dave Fennoy

episodes.name: In the Name of the Rebellion (1)
episodes.overview: As members of the Rebel Alliance, Ezra and the Ghost crew must accept a mission to spy on an Imperial outpost they would rather destroy.

episodes.name: In the Name of the Rebellion (2)
episodes.overview: After being separated from Hera and Kanan, Ezra and Sabine join the desperate quest of Saw Gerrera to hunt down the Empire's elusive secret super weapon.

guest_stars.character: Imperial Captain / Imperial Officer #2 / Mich Matt (voice)
guest_stars.name: David Shaughnessy

episodes.name: The Occupation
episodes.overview: Ezra and the Ghost crew are called back to Lothal when a new Imperial threat rises.

guest_stars.character: Baron Valen Rudor / Imperial Commander (voice) (as Jonny Rees)
guest_stars.name: Greg Ellis

episodes.name: Flight of the Defender
episodes.overview: Ezra and Sabine steal an Imperial prototype TIE fighter but must rely on some unexpected help to escape from Thrawn.

episodes.name: Kindred
episodes.overview: Tracked back to their hidden base by a mysterious Imperial agent, the rebels must trust some seemingly dangerous native creatures, who are far more than meets the eye.

episodes.name: Crawler Commandeers
episodes.overview: Desperate to contact Rebel command, the Ghost crew pirates a mining vehicle with long range communications gear, but the Empire arrives to spoil their plans.

episodes.name: Rebel Assault
episodes.overview: Hera leads a courageous attack against Grand Admiral Thrawn's forces, but when things go awry, her battle to win must become a daring escape if she is to survive.

episodes.name: Jedi Night
episodes.overview: The Ghost Crew infiltrates the Imperial headquarters on Lothal to save one of their own.

guest_stars.character: Grand Moff Tarkin / TIE Pilot / Stormtrooper #3 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Stephen Stanton

episodes.name: DUME
episodes.overview: Reeling from a devastating loss, the Ghost crew rallies together to find a new purpose and resolve.

episodes.name: Wolves and a Door
episodes.overview: Ezra leads the Ghost crew back to the Jedi temple on Lothal where they discover that the Empire has diabolical plans for the powerful secrets it holds.

episodes.name: A World Between Worlds
episodes.overview: While the other rebels engage the Imperial forces outside the Jedi temple, Ezra gains access inside and experiences a revelation.

episodes.name: A Fool's Hope
episodes.overview: The Ghost hatches a plan to free Lothal, though a traitor may be in their midst.

episodes.name: Family Reunion - and Farewell (1)
episodes.overview: Ezra and the Ghost crew look to complete their ultimate mission: to liberate Lothal from the clutches of the Empire.

episodes.name: Family Reunion - and Farewell (2)
episodes.overview: Ezra and the Ghost crew look to complete their ultimate mission: to liberate Lothal from the clutches of the Empire.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: After a devastating battle on Atollon, the Ghost crew and the rebellion continue the fight against the Imperial Forces.
